urls.title: Outdoor Guide to Colorado
urls.description: With an average of 300 days of annual sunshine, the weather always permits for endless outdoor activities in the Centennial State. Between scenic hikes, exploring the stunning national parks, and skiing some of the best mountains into spring - bored is one thing you’ll never be.

data.text:
Happy #ColoradoDay!! It only makes sense Colorado is the home of America’s Greenest Airline. Our employees and animal tails feel quite at home here! Book your trip to this stunning state today!  https://t.co/X1T3nK0cg9

📸: @DENAirport https://t.co/QV60UePTUa

urls.title: Travel Through Raleigh Like A Local
urls.description: You've probably seen Raleigh featured in your favorite tv shows and movies like Talladega Nights, Safe Haven, Outer Banks, and more. Raleigh's unique environment brings in tourists from all over the country. However, we've got you covered if you're a traveler who enjoys skipping the lines and hot spots. We'll show you how to travel through Raleigh like a local.

data.text:
If you love to explore different cities check out one of our newest blog posts featuring Raleigh, North Carolina! 

Learn more about the best places to visit while in Raleigh here: https://t.co/HENAtRLoJ6. Fares from $39!*

@RDUAirport @visitRaleigh

*T's and C's apply. https://t.co/ZXSowSRjwX

urls.title: Your Weekend Guide to Atlanta
urls.description: Founded in 1837, Atlanta originally served as the endpoint of the Western & Atlantic Railroad line, and has become one of the most culturally significant cities in the country, providing us with treasures such as Coca-Cola and Usher.

urls.title: Kenai the Beluga Whale
urls.description: Frontier Plane Tails

data.text: Meet our newest plane tail, Kenai the Beluga Whale! Kenai, is named after the Kenai River. As one of the most scenic and picturesque spots in @TravelAlaska, the Kenai River is also one of the state's most visited spots, putting the whales at risk. https://t.co/hmx2ZZnnol https://t.co/bEju5F1vOQ

data.text:

data.text: @jesbita Hi @jesbita (jesba 👩🏻‍🔬), please DM us here: Twitter Frontier Care DM (https://t.co/RU15h72QCa) so we can look into this for you.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @beingselz Good afternoon @beingselz, thank you for reaching out to Frontier Airlines. I see have spoken with an agent regarding your cancellation. Were you able to provide the documentation pertaining to your request?-Brittany

@cjfinley34 Good afternoon @cjfinley34, thank you for reaching out to Frontier Airlines. I'm sorry to hear you encountered a flight cancellation. Can you private message me your six digit confirmation code along with names listed and I will look into this for you?-Brittany

@Highkey_Hailey Good afternoon @Highkey_Hailey, thank you for reaching out to Frontier Airlines. I'm sorry to hear you encountered a long hold time. Feedback will be provided to the proper department to ensure experience is not repeated. Are you still needing assistance?-Brittany

@frozenduckfeet Do you still need any assistance with your bag claim? If so can you private message me the six digit confirmation code along with the full names and I will look into this for you?-Brittany

@frozenduckfeet Good afternoon @frozenduckfeet, thank you for reaching out to Frontier Airlines. Our baggage departments handled all bag claims. As supervisors in Customer Relations, we can provide any updates if any is noted on your claim.-Brittany

urls.title: Route Map
urls.description: View a map of destination cities served by Frontier Airlines and its partners.

data.text: @mareyes15 I'm glad you asked about our routes. We fly to so many places, so the best way to find what you are looking for is to check out our Route Map Page (https://t.co/Oxwq5M2c3d).
@stephysantana Hi I'm  Juanye, I apologize for the late response due to the high volume of messages. What can I help you with today?-Juanye'
@heartofmilele This policy therefore prohibits tattoos in areas normally visible while wearing our uniform including the face, ears, hands, wrists and neck. -Barb

data.text: @heartofmilele @heartofmilele Tattoos: At Frontier Airlines, we do not allow any visible tattoos while wearing our Flight Attendant uniform, even if covered by makeup, clothing, jewelry and/or a bandage. -Barb

data.text: @sportstrolling1 Hello @sportstrolling1, thank you for reaching out. We apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced. Please DM us with your 6-digit confirmation code along with the name(s) of the passenger(s) for us to look into this.

urls.title: Frontier Airlines | Cheap Fares | Friendly Service
urls.description: Fly away with Frontier and enjoy our low fares to great places. Save a bundle when you get the WORKS℠ and earn miles towards your next trip with us!

data.text: @erationalthots @erationalthots Per your request W5E9MB was cancelled and full refund sent back to card on file. -Barb
@FlyTPA Our Flo the Flamingo wants her hometown airline's hockey team to win. Go @Avalanche! https://t.co/dFy11XI9IT

data.text: @CoachStarin Hi, there! Thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear about your experience. Please send us a private message with your confirmation code and full name so we can assist you. -Gretchen

@morine_doggett Hi, Judyyyyyyy. Thanks for reaching out. It will be a pleasure to help you. Please send us a DM with your 6-digit confirmation code, full names of all the passengers on the booking and your concern so we can assist you further. - Jorge

data.text: @NsrTradings Hi there, thanks for reaching out! Please share with us your 6-digit confirmation code along the full passenger's name through DM for further assistance. - Salvador

@melimpaul Hello Meli M Paul, thanks for reaching out! I am sorry you have had this experience. Please share with us your 6-digit confirmation code along the full passenger's name through DM for further assistance. -Raquel

@melimpaul Hi @melimpaul , thank you for reaching out. We apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced. Please DM us with your 6-digit confirmation code along with the name(s) of the passenger(s) for us to look into this. -Christienne
@melimpaul Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines. I apologize for the delayed response. Please send us a DM so we can further assist you. -Cindy

@Wrestlingmarx Hello, thank you for contacting us. We are sorry for the inconvenience you and your family have experienced. Kindly send us a private message along with your 6-digit confirmation code and passenger names on the reservation if you still need assistance. -Bryan.

@Stoneweezy82 Thank you for providing us an overview of your concern. Kindly DM us with the 6-digit confirmation code associated with your concern along with the name(s) of the passenger(s) as shown on the booking for us to look into this. -Alice
@Karima887 Hello Karima887, thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines! Please DM us with the confirmation code and the passenger's full name so we can look into this for you. -Angie
@mengels11 Hello Mengels11, thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines! Please DM us with the confirmation code and the passenger's full name so we can look into this for you. -Angie
